mapper.insert: insert into project_a.a (date, expense_and_income_number, inputMoney, details) values (#{date}, #{expense_and_income_number}, #{inputMoney}, #{details})
insert into project_a.b (date, expense, income, totleMoney) values (#{date}, 0, 0, income - expense)
mapper.select: select * from project_a.ns_del_data_expense_and_income_name inner join project_a.a using (expense_and_income_number) where date = #{date} order by date desc,expense_and_income_number desc,inputMoney desc
select * from project_a.b where date = #{date} order by date desc
select * from project_a.b where date between #{DatePickerStart} and #{DatePickerEnd} order by date desc
